resources.string: Restore factory settings, will remove your contacts, call, SMS, sticky notes, accounts and other privacy data, as well as in the use of process other personal settings and data information.

system restore is irreversible, make sure your important data have been backed up.\n\ your encrypted contents in private space will also been removed.

- Photos, music and downloaded contents in internal storage.

All rights are reserved by YunOS
Encrypt tablet? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the tablet will restart several times.
Encrypt phone? This operation is irreversible and if you interrupt it, you will lose data. Encryption takes an hour or more, during which the phone will restart several times.

You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your tablet, you must enter a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on: you can\'t unencrypt your tablet except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.\n\nEncryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your tablet plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data.

You can encrypt your accounts, settings, downloaded apps and their data, media, and other files. Once you encrypt your phone, you must enter a numeric PIN or password to decrypt it each time you power it on: you can\'t unencrypt your phone except by performing a factory data reset, erasing all your data.\n\nEncryption takes an hour or more. You must start with a charged battery and keep your phone plugged in until encryption is complete. If you interrupt the encryption process, you will lose some or all of your data.
Charge your battery and try again.
Plug in your charger and try again.
Desktop full backups aren\'t currently protected.

Encryption was interrupted and can\'t complete. As a result, the data on your tablet is no longer accessible. \n\n To resume using your tablet, you must perform a factory reset. When you set up your tablet after the reset, you\'ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Cloud Account.

Encryption was interrupted and can\'t complete. As a result, the data on your phone is no longer accessible. \n\nTo resume using your phone, you must perform a factory reset. When you set up your phone after the reset, you\'ll have an opportunity to restore any data that was backed up to your Cloud Account.
Wait while your tablet is being encrypted. ^1% complete.
Wait while your phone is being encrypted. ^1% complete.

At present you can send email with your application to appmarket@service.alibaba.com, and the staff of YunOS will reply with the result in one working day. Your application email should be formatted as follows:
Subject:Application to be a YunOS developer of XXX
Body:
Cloud account: xxx
Name: xxx
ID number: xxx
Phone number: xxx
Email: xxx
Alipay account: xxx
Mailing address (optional): xxx
Application statement (optional): xxx

When your application is approved, the application and installation of certificate will be completed by following steps: open the app "Developer certificate", login with cloud account and tap "Apply to install".\nAfter installation, connect your phone with Google Eclipse ADT to debug phone.\nYou can find the app "Developer certificate" in Settings > About phone > Developer certificate Manager
Open the app "Developer certificate", login with cloud account and tap "View certificate".
Open the app "Developer certificate", login with cloud account and tap "Uninstall certificate".

The system will accelerate after reboot, there will be a faster runtime but the application compatibility may be less degree. Restart process will be longer, please be patient. do you want to open it now?

The system will close acceleration mode after reboot, there will be a better application compatibility but the speed will be slower. Restart process will be longer, please be patient. do you want to close it now?
No enough system space switch to acceleration mode

In senior mode, system will,
· set font size to extra large
· extend tapping respond time
· volume up
· disable desktop advanced gestures
· enable contacts shortcut
· hide low frequency apps into folder
· extend screen standby time
System settings will revert after you switch senior mode off.

Other includes shared files saved by apps, files downloaded from the Internet or Bluetooth, Android files, and so on. \n\nTo see the entire contents of this ^1, touch Explore.

For moving photos and other media between devices.
For storing anything on this device only, including apps and photos. Requires formatting that prevents it from working with other devices.

For storing anything on this device only, including apps and photos. Requires formatting that prevents it from working with other devices.

This requires the ^1 to be formatted to make it secure. 

After formatting, this ^1 will only work in this device. 

Formatting erases all data currently stored on the ^1. To avoid losing the data, consider backing it up.
This requires the ^1 to be formatted. \n\nFormatting erases all data currently stored on the ^1. To avoid losing the data, consider backing it up.
Don\u2019t remove the ^1 while it\u2019s formatting.
You can move your photos, files, and some apps to this new ^1. \n\nThe move takes about ^2 and will free ^3 on internal storage. Some apps won\u2019t work while it\u2019s underway.
Move the data on the SD card into internal storage device,It will free ^1.
Move the data on the internal storage device into SD card ,It will free ^1.

During the move: 
• Don’t remove the ^1. 
• Some apps won’t work correctly. 
• Keep the device charged.
Your ^1 is all set to use with photos and other media.
Your new ^1 is working. \n\nTo move photos, files, and app data to this device, go to Settings > Storage.
Moving ^1 and its data to ^2 will take only a few moments. You won\u2019t be able to use the app until the move is complete. \n\nDon\u2019t remove the ^2 during the move.
Don\u2019t remove the ^1 during the move. \n\nThe ^2 app on this device won\u2019t be available until the move is complete.

This ^1 appears to be slow. 

You can continue, but apps moved to this location may stutter and data transfers may take a long time. 

Consider using a faster ^1 for better performance.
This ^1 is corrupted. \n\nTo use this ^1, you have to set it up first.
This device doesn\u2019t support this ^1. \n\nTo use this ^1 with this device, you have to set it up first.

Place the right edge of the finger in the center of the sensing area of the back of the fingerprint.
